risk_factors: No explicit mention of soft skills in the resume
Relocation risk due to no current location mentioned
growth_signals: ISTQB certification indicates commitment to professional development
Experience with Agile/Scrum methodology and CI/CD pipelines shows adaptability to modern workflows
Consistent career progression with relevant roles and responsibilities
Experience in both web and mobile application testing demonstrates versatility
selection_reason: Ankit Verma is a strong candidate for the Application Testing Engineer role. He meets all the technical skill requirements, including manual and automation testing, Selenium, JIRA, Postman, and SQL queries. His experience aligns well with the job description, as he has 3 years of relevant experience in application testing, including functional, regression, and API testing. His ISTQB certification adds credibility to his testing expertise, and his familiarity with Agile/Scrum and CI/CD pipelines is a bonus. While the lack of explicitly stated soft skills and current location introduces minor risks, his overall profile demonstrates strong technical competence, relevant experience, and growth potential. The recruiter is confident in his ability to perform well in this role.

Responsibilities: Designed and executed test cases for web and mobile apps.
Automated regression test cases using Selenium WebDriver.
Validated APIs using Postman and automated test scripts.
Worked closely with developers to resolve defects in Agile sprints.
Conducted functional and regression testing on enterprise apps.
Prepared test plans and detailed bug reports.
